name: Ditch Whit #1 - Shield Night
description:
DITCH WHIT #1 - SHIELD NIGHT v0.1.0

* Doesn't support mobile devices. Optimized for Chrome. Won't work in an Incognito session. *

Additional lore and context for those who've completed NORCO. It's still a bit janky. We'll continue to build it out over the summer.  There's a short bibliography for the game that's still being fleshed out here.

Track composed by MoPodna.

Love, 
GoR

=========

Known issues:

  • Command fonts may be distorted on some monitor.
  • Uses local storage and won't work in an Incognito session.
